name.value: Vaccination Protocol Dose Status Reason codes

description.value: This code system supports describing the reason why an administered dose has been assigned a particular status. Often, this reason describes why a dose is considered invalid.

definition.value: The product was stored in a manner inconsistent with manufacturer guidelines potentially reducing the effectiveness of the product.
The product was stored at a temperature inconsistent with manufacturer guidelines potentially reducing the effectiveness of the product.
The product was administered after the expiration date associated with lot of vaccine.
The product was administered at a time inconsistent with the documented schedule.
The product administered has been recalled by the manufacturer.
